title: Drake and 21 Savage’s ‘Her Loss’ Review: A Frisky Experiment
description: The rappers’ collaborative album is loose and untethered, a frisky experiment that’s intermittently successful.
dc:creator: Jon Caramanica
media:description: Drake and 21 Savage onstage last month. The two rappers’ collaborative album, “Her Loss,” arrived with an elaborate rollout and a strong metanarrative.
